languages.text: {n}Кровь начинает заполошно стучать у вас в висках, предвещая опасность. Вы закрываете глаза и направляете все усилия на сопротивление колдовской атаке. Спустя несколько мгновений ваше сердце замедляет бег, а сосуды уже не пытаются взорваться от давления. Страх, волной обрушившийся на вас по чужой злой воле, бессильно откатывается прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кровь начинает заполошно стучать у вас в висках, предвещая опасность. Вы закрываете глаза, сосредотачиваетесь... и вдруг чувствуете, как сердце замедляет бег, а сосуды уже не пытаются взорваться от давления. Страх, волной обрушившийся на вас по чужой злой воле, бессильно откатывается прочь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кровь начинает заполошно стучать у вас в висках, предвещая опасность. Вы закрываете глаза и направляете все усилия на сопротивление колдовской атаке. Спустя несколько мгновений ваше сердце замедляет бег, а сосуды уже не пытаются взорваться от давления. Страх, волной обрушившийся на вас по чужой злой воле, бессильно откатывается прочь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a telltale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and the vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that has washed over you, driven by another's ill will, ebbs powerlessly.{/n}

The fear that has washed over you, spurned forward by another's ill behest, ebbs powerlessly.{/n}

After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. languages.text: {n}La sangre empieza a bombear frenéticamente en tus sienes, un claro signo de peligro. Cierras los ojos y centras todos tus esfuerzos en resistir la hechicería que te ataca. Tras unos momentos, tu corazón se ralentiza y tus vasos sanguíneos dejan de querer estallar. El miedo que inundaba tu mente impulsado por la mala voluntad ajena remite, impotente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sangre empieza a bombear frenéticamente en tus sienes, un claro signo de peligro. Cierras los ojos y centras todos tus esfuerzos en resistir la hechicería que te ataca. Tras unos momentos, tu corazón se ralentiza y tus vasos sanguíneos dejan de querer estallar. El miedo que recorría tu mente impulsado por una voluntad ajena remite, impotente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}危険が迫ってきていることを感じ取っているかのように、血の流れがこめかみに向かって勢いよく集結した。目を閉じ、魔術攻撃に抗うことに全力で集中した。しばらくすると心臓の鼓動が落ち着き、血管を破るほどの血圧もいくらか和らいだ。他人の悪意に駆り立てられた恐怖心は、力なく消えていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}危険が迫ってきていることを感じ取っているかのように、血の流れがこめかみに向かって勢いよく集結した。目を閉じ、魔術攻撃に抗うことに全力で集中した。しばらくすると心臓の鼓動が落ち着き、血管を破るほどの血圧もいくらか和らいだ。他人の悪意に駆り立てられた恐怖心は、力なく消えていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}鲜血开始在你的太阳穴里疯狂地涌动，这是危险的信号。你闭上眼睛，集中精力，抵抗巫术的攻击。过了一会儿，你的心跳慢了下来，原本在压力之下绷紧的血管，此刻也不再濒临破裂。你的恐惧曾在另一个人的不祥勒令下，如同海潮一般吞没了你的全身，此刻已无力地消散殆尽。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鲜血开始在你的太阳穴里疯狂地涌动，这是危险的信号。你闭上眼睛，集中精力，抵抗巫术的攻击。过了一会儿，你的心跳慢了下来，原本在压力之下绷紧的血管，此刻也不再濒临破裂。你的恐惧曾在另一个人的不祥勒令下，如海潮一般吞没了你的全身，此刻已无力地消散殆尽。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sang commence à affluer frénétiquement dans vos tempes, comme en signe de danger imminent. Vous fermez les yeux et tentez par tous les moyens de résister au sortilège qui vous assaille. Après quelques instants, votre rythme cardiaque ralentit et la pression dans vos veines se relâche quelque peu. La peur qui vous avait {mf|envahi|envahie}, attisée par une force sinistre, reflue enfin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sang commence à affluer frénétiquement dans vos tempes, comme en signe de danger imminent. Vous fermez les yeux et tentez par tous les moyens de résister au sortilège qui vous assaille. Après quelques instants, votre rythme cardiaque, ralentit et la pression dans vos veines se relâche quelque peu. La peur qui vous avait {mf|envahi|envahie}, engendrée par une force sinistre, reflue enfin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Blut beginnt frenetisch in deinen Schläfen zu pumpen, ein klares Zeichen, dass Gefahr droht. Du schließt die Augen und konzentrierst all deine Bemühungen darauf, dem magischen Angriff zu widerstehen. Nach einigen Augenblicken verlangsamt sich dein Herzschlag und deine Blutgefäße versuchen nicht länger, vor Druck zu platzen. Die Angst, die dich überrollt hatte, angetrieben vom bösen Wunsch eines anderen, verebbt machtlos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}

Du schließt die Augen und konzentrierst all deine Bemühungen darauf, dem magischen Angriff zu widerstehen. Nach einigen Augenblicken verlangsamt sich dein Herzschlag und deine Blutgefäße versuchen nicht länger, vor Druck zu platzen. Die Angst, die dich überrollt hatte, angetrieben vom bösen Wunsch eines anderen, verebbt machtlos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şakaklarında hızlanan nabzın, tehlikenin bariz bir delaleti olarak seni uyarıyor. Gözlerini kapatıp bu büyü saldırısına var gücünle direnmeye çalışıyorsun. Bir müddet sonra nabzın yavaşlıyor ve basınçtan patlamak üzere olan damarlarını rahat bırakıyor. Bir başkasının kötü emelleriyle vücudunu saran korku, azalarak yitip gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blood starts pumping frenetically in your temples as a tell-tale sign of danger. You close your eyes and focus all your efforts on resisting the sorcerous attack. After a few moments, your heart slows down, and your blood vessels are no longer trying to burst from the pressure. The fear that washed over you, spurred on by another's ill will, ebbs away powerlessly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şakaklarında hızlanan nabzın, tehlikenin bariz bir delaleti olarak seni uyarıyor. Gözlerini kapatıp bu büyü saldırısına var gücünle direnmeye çalışıyorsun. Bir müddet sonra nabzın yavaşlıyor ve basınçtan patlamak üzere olan damarlarını rahat bırakıyor. Bir başkasının kötü emelleriyle vücudunu saran korku, zayıflaşarak yitip gidiyor.{/n}
